error.signature: Error: Workspace not found: the workspace does not exist
error.regex: (Workspace .+ not found|workspace .+ does not exist|No workspace named|Currently selected workspace .+ does not exist)

verdict.summary: Terraform workspace referenced in configuration or CLI does not exist in the backend.

dead_ends.action: Edit the .terraform/environment file to force-set the workspace
dead_ends.why_fails: If the workspace does not exist in the backend, manually setting the file creates an invalid state

dead_ends.action: Use terraform.workspace in conditions without creating the workspace first
dead_ends.why_fails: References to terraform.workspace assume the workspace exists; plan fails if it does not

workarounds.action: Create the missing workspace using terraform workspace new
Switch to an existing workspace using terraform workspace select
workarounds.how: terraform workspace list to see available workspaces, then terraform workspace select WORKSPACE_NAME

leads_to.condition: Wrong workspace leads to missing or incorrect state

preceded_by.condition: Backend migration to new backend does not migrate workspaces automatically

frequently_confused_with.distinction: Error loading state is about corrupted or inaccessible state; workspace not found is about the workspace itself not existing
